sentences: Toshiko Fujita (藤田 淑子, Fujita Toshiko, April 5, 1950 – December 28, 2018) was a Japanese actress, voice actress, singer and narrator.
Since the age of 8 in 1958, Fujita worked in radio and television as an actress, singer and comedian.
In addition, she also sang theme songs for anime such as the 1969 adaptation of Dororo.
